tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayCLASSES False output_data_DENSITY $output_data_DENSITY output_data_CONNECTIVITY $output_data_CONNECTIVITY output_data_FRAGMENTATION $output_data_FRAGMENTATION output_data_FRAGSTATS $output_data_FRAGSTATS name SAGA.grid_analysis.15 CLASSES $CLASSES CLASS $CLASS NEIGHBORHOOD_MIN $NEIGHBORHOOD_MIN NEIGHBORHOOD_MAX $NEIGHBORHOOD_MAX AGGREGATION $AGGREGATION BORDER $BORDER WEIGHT $WEIGHT DENSITY_MIN $DENSITY_MIN DENSITY_INT $DENSITY_INT CIRCULAR $CIRCULAR DIAGONAL $DIAGONAL prefer $prefer response $response outputType_DENSITY $OutputSection_DENSITY.outputType_DENSITY transmissionMode_DENSITY $OutputSection_DENSITY.transmissionMode_DENSITY outputType_CONNECTIVITY $OutputSection_CONNECTIVITY.outputType_CONNECTIVITY transmissionMode_CONNECTIVITY $OutputSection_CONNECTIVITY.transmissionMode_CONNECTIVITY outputType_FRAGMENTATION $OutputSection_FRAGMENTATION.outputType_FRAGMENTATION transmissionMode_FRAGMENTATION $OutputSection_FRAGMENTATION.transmissionMode_FRAGMENTATION outputType_FRAGSTATS $OutputSection_FRAGSTATS.outputType_FRAGSTATS transmissionMode_FRAGSTATS $OutputSection_FRAGSTATS.transmissionMode_FRAGSTATS

tool.help: Grid based fragmentation analysis after Riitters et al. (2000).<br/><br/>(1) interior, if Density = 1.0<br/>(2) undetermined, if Density > 0.6 and Density = Connectivity<br/>(3) perforated, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity > 0<br/>(4) edge, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity < 0<br/>(5) transitional, if 0.4 < Density < 0.6<br/>(6) patch, if Density < 0.4<br/>
